metadata.title: RA Family: e² studio Windows Compatibility

sections.content:
Question:
I’m not able to build an RA example project. What could be wrong?
Answer:
FSP 2020-04 and later releases of e2studio are based on 64-bit windows versions.
If your system is windows 32-bit, it may be the reason for your problem.
Ιf you see two versions of FSP on your system, try to uninstall the old one.
If possible, uninstall both of the versions of fsp and try to install the latest versions, downloaded from the Renesas website.
  Suitable Products
RA
